name: A Turtle's Adventures
description:
A Turtle's Adventures is a rhythm game based on the album A Turtle's Adventures by Babasmas and Caturday.

Link to the album : 

I'm not a graphist myself so the game is basically an engine demo but it's still playable :)

It features the basic things you expect to see i an rythm game, but as I had access to every song stems, it also provides cool things such as 

   - being able to play the part of your choice (drum, melody, chords, secondary melody)

  - mute the part you're playing if you miss a note

  - having your part with slighlty more volume than the other parts

  - having diffrent difficulties for the same song (mainly, it goes like that : chords < melody < drums < secondary melody)

Enjoy !

Caturday <3
